author: Patrice Gaines
title: For many black women, home styling is a hair-raising challenge
description: "Corporate America does not understand I can't perm or straighten my own hair."
content:
Arabella Grayson has returned to the do-rag. Pauletta Williams is wearing a natural hairstyle after burning her hand with a flat iron. Tracy Miller is just glad her co-workers can't see her home-done hairdo.
The closing of beauty shops across the country bec… [+4878 chars]
